description: This file defines a UI component called 'Loader' using LightningJS (imported as '@lightningjs/blits'). The component renders animated circles that serve as a loading indicator, with properties for customization and internal state management for transition effects.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A UI component representing a loading indicator with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the alpha property to create fade-in and fade-out animation.
